biotools.summary: An open source protocol to design modified peptides with improved binding affinity to a target of reference. The protocol generates single-point mutations on the peptide sequence based on a list of parameterized non-natural amino acids (NNAAs). Then, it estimates their binding affinities in complex with the protein in an efficient but accurate manner by combining backrub sampling from Rosetta with a consensus metric using multiple protein-ligand scoring functions.

bioschemas.name: mPARCE
